title: Gold amulet

properties.value: Gold amulet is a piece of jewellery that is worn in the neck slot. It is made by using a gold bar on a furnace with an amulet mould, followed by using a ball of wool on the resulting Gold amulet (u). This requires level 8 Crafting and the player receives 30 experience for making the amulet and an additional 4 experience for stringing it.

Advanced data
Item ID1692

Gold amulet is a piece of jewellery that is worn in the neck slot. It is made by using a gold bar on a furnace with an amulet mould, followed by using a ball of wool on the resulting Gold amulet (u). This requires level 8 Crafting and the player receives 30 experience for making the amulet and an additional 4 experience for stringing it.

The gold amulet cannot be enchanted, making it purely cosmetic. However, it can be sold to Grum's Gold Exchange in Port Sarim for 245 coins or at the Grand Exchange.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In a 2018 update, the sprites for unenchanted jewelry were rotated to distinguish them from their enchanted counterparts. However, the gold amulet, alongside other gold jewellery, was unaffected by this change.
    • This is most likely because gold jewellery cannot be enchanted.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005

The item's examine was changed from "I wonder if I can get this enchanted." to "A plain gold amulet."
